description: Agent observability: structured logging, cost tracking, and compliance audit trails

environmentVariables.name: AGENT_OBS_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for the Agent Observability service (get one at POST /v1/register)

environmentVariables.name: AGENT_OBS_API_URL
environmentVariables.description: URL of the Agent Observability API (defaults to https://api-production-0c55.up.railway.app)
